name: The Soul Labyrinth
description:
In the game The Soul Labyrinth, you are thrown into a mysterious maze with a horrifying monster hot on your heels. Your only hope of survival is to collect souls to keep your lantern shining bright and find your way to the exit before the monster catches you.

The game's stylized graphics create an immersive and haunting atmosphere that will leave you feeling on edge. The maze is dimly lit, and the eerie soundtrack adds to the sense of danger lurking around every corner.

Features:
  • The Map is procedurally generated on the fly, meaning every room you visit wont be the same.
  • You will need to collect souls to increase your chances of finding the escape room.
  • A monster will try hunt you down, you just need to make sure that you can run away before he catches you.
  • The soul Lantern is the only way to keep the dark from coming for you, but the catch is that you need to sacrifice souls to keep it lit.

What you can expect:
A fun endless labyrinth which is procedurally generated with hours of fun times of trying to escape and not getting caught.
